caption: The Children song features wide harmonizing vocals singing over shimmering shakers, groovy bass, punchy snare, soft kick hits, groovy piano chords, shimmering bells melody and acoustic rhythm guitar chords. It sounds addictive, happy and fun - as every children's song should sound.
